SEARCH
Module com.example.showSequencerJavafx
Package com.example.showSequencerJavafx

Class Cue

java.lang.Object
com.example.showSequencerJavafx.Cue
All Implemented Interfaces:
States
public class Cue extends Object implements States
Class instantiated for each individual cue. Performs action when ran depending on type.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.example.showSequencerJavafx.States

  • Constructor Details

    • Cue

      public Cue(String cueNum, String cueName, double cueAuto, MainController.COMMAND cueCommand, PlaylistFile cueFile, double cueVol, double cueTime, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Cue> tableView, MainController mainController)
      Constructs Cue Object, Assigns Values and Refreshes Table
      Parameters:
      cueNum - User entered cue number
      cueName - User entered cue name
      cueAuto - Time to autoplay the next cue if not null
      cueCommand - Type of cue functionality
      cueFile - PlaylistFile object to be controlled by this instance
      cueVol - Volume of audio playback
      cueTime - Time for faders to increase/decrease volume
      tableView - Table containing the cue
      mainController - Controller class creating the cue
